name: LandAR
description:
Team Name 

SaltTheEarth

Gameplay Instructions 

Press the onscreen buttons to control your ship.

Use the onscreen buttons to control the ship.
Start button - start the game
Thruster button - Propel the ship in the opposite direction
Slider - Aim blaster / Move shield
Blaster button - Shoot blaster in the direction it's aiming

What platform is your game built for? 

iOS (iPad Pro 12.9in)

List any content that was created before the jam that was included in the final submission. 

- Earth

- Spacecats 

- Space texture 

- Control icons 

- Asteroids
